SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class CommonGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CommonGoal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LineCommonGoal, ShapeCommonGoal, StairCommonGoal, TupleCommonGoal
public abstract class CommonGoal extends Object implements Serializable

This class is used to define a generic standard structure for all common goal cards. Each common goal card have its own explanation and a set of points associated. The set of points associated to the card are ordered from the higher to the lower and only the higher number present can be retrieved, which is also the top-leve number. Then the functioning of the points is a sort of stack.

Default value for:

  • scoring tokens stack is not a null reference, but an empty sets of element
  • description is "Empty description"

Since:
11/04/2023
Version:
3.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

    • scoringTokens

      private final Stack<Integer> scoringTokens
      Values of the available score that will be assigned to the next player that will satisfy that exact CommonGoal. This field represents the scoring tokens associated with the common goal card.

    • rule

      public abstract List<EntryPatternGoal> rule(TileType[][] bookShelf)

      The method returns null if the CommonGoal is not satisfied for the bookShelf argument.

      If the common goal is satisfied then the method returns a list of the EntryPatternGoals representing the tiles in the BookShelf that satisfy the CommonGoal.

      Parameters:
      bookShelf - the bookshelf to be checked
      Returns:
      • null if the CommonGoal is not satisfied
      • list of EntryPatternGoal that satisfied the CommonGoal otherwise

      Returns:
